pageContent: Background: Evidence suggests that minimally invasive radical prostatectomy (MRP) and open radical prostatectomy (ORP) have similar short-term clinical and functional outcomes. MRP with robotic assistance is generally more expensive than ORP, but it is not clear whether subsequent costs of care vary by approach.

metaData.source:
Management of patients receiving transperineal palladium-103 prostate implants
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9380591/
